title: Onboarding
custom_steps:
login with the following credentials:

username: milbtvyearly18@gmail.com

password: Password1

tap Log In button
custom_expected: Onboarding should complete, Team tab should be visible

custom_steps_separated.content: Delete the app and re-install to wipe out any locally-stored data
Select a team in each class tab (MLB affiliate, Triple-A...)
Tap NEXT in top right
custom_steps_separated.expected: A long list of teams should appear (teams you selected)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Drag two teams to different spots
Move one to be the new favorite team (top spot)
custom_steps_separated.expected: team order should reflect your dragging

custom_steps_separated.content: Tap SAVE in top right
Notifications (skip until working)
Tap SAVE in top right

login with the following credentials:

username: milbtvyearly18@gmail.com

password: Password1

tap Log In button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Onboarding should complete, Team tab should be visible

title: News (tab)
custom_preconds:
if no favorite team is selected, Triple-A should show at top of screen with

INTERNATIONAL AND PACIFIC COAST league tabs

verify both league tabs show appropriate webViews

custom_steps_separated.content: select a favorite, non Triple-A team (More tab, SETTINGS, favorite teams)
custom_steps_separated.expected: verify league tabs appear and show appropriate webViews

custom_steps_separated.content: Select EPG button (video camera) in top right

title: EPG // Electronic Program Guide (camera button throughout the app)

custom_steps_separated.content: find a day in which games exist, such as 9/2/19
tap on FINAL button for a completed game and verify video plays (must be signed in)
custom_steps_separated.expected: if in regular season, attempt to stream a live game if possible

custom_steps_separated.content:
tap class at top (starts on TRIPLE-A) and change to a different class

repeat above steps
verify Scoreboard webview appears
verify league tabs show for current class (example Double-A shows Eastern, Southern, Texas)
tap each league tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: verify appropriate webView shows for each league

custom_steps_separated.content: verify common tabs show and corresponding views appear upon tapping them.
Stats - MiLB Stats webview

Teams - Team selector view

select a team and verify corresponding team page appears
Player Search - Find a Player webview appears
Gameday Audio - webView
MiLB.com Podcast - webView
MiLB.com Store - webView
MiLB Auctions - webView
Prospect Watch - webView
PlayBall.org - webView
Notifications (skip until working)
About First Pitch
custom_steps_separated.expected: should show Build Number and Config Environment

custom_steps_separated.content: Select favorite teams
Reset your MiLB.com password
Create a MiLB.com Account
EPG button (camera) is functional (see EPG section)
Audio button (headphones) is functional (shows webView)
favorite team name shows in top bar with team color as top bar background
tapping team name allows selection of a different team
dragging view under bar should result in top bar collapse
dragging to original position should result in top bar restore to original size

game should show in scoreboard

if no game today, show most recent game

if game today, show most recent until 10am ET (flip time), then show today's game

verify home and away teams, logos, records, runs, hits, and errors appear

verify GAMEDAY link appears in bottom right and is selectable (shows webview upon tap)

tap previous day button (top left of team scoreboard)

verify game with teams and links show as with previous step

tap schedule button (top right of team scoreboard)

verify schedule webview opens

tap Team News button

verify selected Team's news webview appears

tap Team Videos button

verify selected Team's video webview appears

tap all buttons

verify appropriate webview shows

tap all social media buttons

verify appropriate webview shows
custom_steps_separated.expected: these should show a team's social media unless a value isn't present, and then show the MiLB equivalent (one of the three usually shows a team's social media)

custom_steps_separated.content:
tap Roster button

verify selected Team's Roster webview appears

tap Stats button

verify selected Team's stats webview appears

tap Standings button

verify selected Team's standings webview appears
multiple team logos should show, tap one and verify that Team's page now shows
tap More tab
tap SETTINGS in top right
tap Select favorite teams option near middle of screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Team Select screen should show (similar to Onboarding)

custom_steps_separated.content: select no teams
tap NEXT in top right
tap SAVE in top right
custom_steps_separated.expected: News tab should now be showing (no team page for MiLB currently)
